summary: Add a ring to the game with unique enchantments that give the wearer the power of orc "Berserk" to take half the damage and increase unarmed damage over 100
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]Ring of Bloody Fists

Add a ring to the game with unique enchantments that give the wearer the power of orc "Berserk" to take half the damage and increase unarmed damage over 100

Location:
whiterun dragonsreach

Required :
Skyrim.esm

[b]Installation : [/b]
NMM or copy to data folder

[b]Uninstall : [/b]
Remove from NMM or Delete from data folder

[b]Credit : [/b]
BETHESDA
Creation Kit
[b]
Please leave a comment and endorsement
"Thanks you for download"
[/b][/size][/font][/center]
author: Fachry
